name: Saadi
wishText: As we grow older, may our hearts stay young forever ;)
textInChatBox: You’re the best! Thanks for the birthday wishes
text2: I made this to celebrate your special day and ...
text3: to honor the amazing friend you are!
text4: I was thinking about how lucky I am to have a friend like you, so I decided to do something
text5Content: You deserve memories that will never fade!
replayText: Click below link. I’ve got something special for you! :)
waitForSurprise: Hold on, the best part is next!
